Trainer(4)
This is the perfect place to train my water-type Pokémon!
column2: ¡Este es el lugar perfecto para entrenar a mi Pokémon de tipo agua!

column1: My Pokémon can't get enough of all these puddles! Do you want to have another fight?
column2: ¡Mis Pokémon no se cansan de saltar en los charcos! ¿Te animas a otra batalla?

column1: Yes
No
On the S.S. Anne, I saw trainers from around the world.
column2: Cuando viajé en el S.S. Anne, ¡había entrenadores de cada rincón del planeta!

column1: Hey by the way, would you like to trade for one of my Pokemon?
column2: Oye, por cierto... ¿te gustaría intercambiar uno de mis Pokémon?

column1: I've always wanted a Rock-type Pokemon, so I'll trade you my Pokémon for any rock type Pokemon.
column2: Siempre he querido un Pokémon de tipo Roca, así que te intercambiaré el mío por cualquier Pokémon de este tipo.

column1: Which Pokemon do you want?
Papoke
Polirow
Which Pokemon are you going to give me?
"ROCK"
You don't want to trade? Aww...
Perfect, let's get started!
"Papoke"
"Dan"
I hope you take care of Papoke!
"Polirow"
I hope you take care of Polirow!
I would've impressed so many people on the S.S. Anne with my new Rock-type Pokemon!
column2: ¡Habría impresionado a tantos en el S.S. Anne con mi nuevo Pokémon tipo Roca!

column1: lilypad.sl
TYPE_EXPERT_WATER
dialogIcon
You beat me at my own game. I'll never be able to live it down!
column2: Me venciste en mi propio juego. ¡Nunca podré superar esta derrota!

column1: EV017
I'm off to see a Pokémon collector at the cape!
column2: ¡Me voy a ver a un coleccionista de Pokémon en el cabo!

column1: The collector has many rare kinds of POKEMON.
column2: El coleccionista tiene muchos POKEMON raros.

column1: Hey, you look like you have some pretty cool Pokemon yourself.
column2: Oye, parece que tú también tienes unos Pokémon geniales.

column1: What do you think of having a trade with me, right here, right now?
column2: ¡Ey, se ve que tienes Pokémon increíbles! ¿Qué tal un intercambio aquí y ahora?

column1: I'll trade you my Oddix for any of your Pokemon, so long as it's at least level 17, is that fine?
column2: Te intercambiaré mi Oddix por cualquiera de tus Pokémon, siempre que sea al menos nivel 17. ¿Te parece?

column1: So, which Pokemon are you going to give me?
column2: Entonces, ¿qué Pokémon me vas a dar?

column1: "Oddix"
"Wayne"
I hope you take care of Oddix!
I guess I'll hold on to my Oddix then.
column2: Supongo que me quedaré con mi Oddix entonces.

column1: That Pokémon you gave me, it's a pretty good fighter!
column2: ¡Guau! No esperaba que este Pokémon peleara tan bien.

column1: EV012
EV001
EV018
I knew I had to fight you!
I think I saw something move under these lilypads...
column2: Creo que vi algo moverse debajo de estos lilypads ...

column1: Hey, while we're at it, what do you think of trading a Pokemon for one of mines?
column2: ¡Ey! Ya que estamos aquí, ¿te interesa hacer un intercambio de Pokémon?

column1: I'll take any Poison-type Pokémon as long as it's at least level 14.
column2: Tomaré cualquier Pokémon de tipo veneno mientras sea de Nivel 14.

column1: Which of my Pokémon do you want to trade for?
Venokans
Venoshrew
Which Pokémon are you going to give me?
"POISON"
"Venokans"
"Flint"
You'll see, Venokans can be a very strong Pokémon!
column2: ¡Ya verás lo poderosos que pueden llegar a ser los Venokans!

column1: "Venoshrew"
You'll see, Venoshrew can be a very strong Pokémon!
column2: ¡Ya verás lo poderosos que pueden llegar a ser los Venoshrew!

column1: I'll hang on to my Pokémon then!
column2: Bueno... me quedaré con mi Pokémon.

column1: Thanks for your Pokémon, I'll take care of it!
column2: Gracias por tu Pokémon, ¡Lo voy a cuidar!

column1: And remember, if your Pokémon gets confused or falls asleep, switch it!
column2: Y recuerda, si tu Pokémon se confunde o cae dormido, ¡Cámbialo!

column1: You're going to see Bill? First, let's fight!
Bill's lighthouse isn't very far from here, we should have time for another battle, what do you think?
column2: El faro de Bill no está muy lejos de aquí. Tenemos tiempo para otra batalla, ¿qué te parece?

column1: I just have to heal my Pokemon and...
column2: Solo tengo que curar a mi Pokémon y ...

column1: Alright, I'm ready. Let's do this!
You're a busy little guy, aren't you? I can understand that!
EV013
I just got down from Mt. Moon, but I'm ready!
column2: Acabo de bajar del monte Moon, ¡pero estoy listo!

column1: I just healed my Pokemon, what do you say we have another battle?
column2: Acabo de curar a mis Pokémon. ¿Qué dices si tenemos otra batalla?

column1: Get ready, here I come!
No worries, I'll just keep on training on my own over here.
column2: No te preocupes, seguiré entrenando por aquí.

column1: EV014
I'm a cool guy. I've got a girlfriend!
I'll impress my girl by being a gentleman and trade you my rare Bulbtata.
column2: ¡Impresionaré a mi chica siendo todo un caballero y cambiándote mi raro Bulbtata!

column1: I'll take any Pokemon that's at least level 20 for it, what do you think?
column2: Acepto cualquier Pokémon de nivel 20 o más. ¿Qué te parece?

column1: Which Pokemon are you giving me?
Oh, you changed your mind after all?
column2: "Oh, ¿así que al final cambiaste de opinión?

column1: "Bulbtata"
"Chad"
Take care of Bulbtata, it's a very rare Pokemon!
column2: ¡Cuida de mi Bulbtata, es un Pokémon muy raro!

column1: It's fine, my girlfriend won't think any less of me for not being a gentleman!
column2: ¡No importa! Mi novia no me verá menos por no ser un caballero.

column1: My girlfriend has been in such awe with me since we did that trade!
column2: ¡Mi novia ha estado tan impresionada conmigo desde ese intercambio!

column1: EV026
Local trainers come here to practice!
column2: ¡Los entrenadores locales vienen aquí para practicar!

column1: All Pokémon have weaknesses. It's best to raise different kinds.
column2: Todos los Pokémon tienen debilidades. Es mejor criar de diferentes tipos.

column1: Say, would you like to have another battle?
Okay, get ready, here I come!
It's fine, I don't want to pressure you!
EV015
Trainer(7)
Hi! My boyfriend is cool!
I wish my guy was as good as you!
column2: ¡Ojalá mi chico fuera tan bueno como tú!

column1: Hey, you want to have another battle?
Just let me heal my Pokémon.
Okay, let's do this!
Oh well, I'll stick to practicing with my boyfriend then.
column2: Bueno, entonces seguiré practicando con mi novio.
